pageContext.claim: “You have to see, U.S. Steel, what they're doing... new core, building new plants, expanding old plants.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of eight or nine facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois and the upgrading of one in Indiana.
